example.parse: (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-4 (ADJP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_ACC اكثر) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وجهة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN نظر)))))) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ترى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)) (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC مسؤوليت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3D هما))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC متساوية) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تعطيل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دور) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوزراء)))))))

arg.g: in disable the role of the Council of Ministers
